title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models and switching contexts quickly.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown files.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor, and chat with code using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive streaming support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js REST proxy that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting, and usage logs atop Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama via fetch, no backend needed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards user messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Reference Docker Compose stacks adding CPU/GPU support, webui, and Chroma sidecars.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, CodeLlama, etc.
